runs.comm: good shout first up, and a loose shot from Dilshan, but the ball pitched marginally outside leg stump before cutting in and hitting the back flap, good decision by the  umpire
pitches on and about off stump and Dilshan pokes it to the off side
subtle movement, again pitching on off, and pushed away
pitches full and swings in, Dilshan's bat comes down late and he gets struck outside leg stump this time, but he's quick to respond to the call for the run off the pads
pitched up outside off stump and he dabs it to the off side, calling immediately for the sharp single and Dilshan responds well to the call

catch that ... no, oh lord what a sloppy attempt! He's dropped in the first over! Zaheer pitches it up on on off stump and Dilshan swings at it loosely, spooning the ball up into the starry night. Irfan Pathan runs in from mid-off and has all the time in the world to settle under a dolly, but he fluffs an easy catch
pitches it up just outside off stump and thats pushed to cover
good ball, hitting the seam and moving and rising past Dilshan
a bit too much movement from Ishant, spraying the ball down the lag side and Dilshan just gets a faint tickle on it and the ball beats Dhoni behind the stumps
thats a much better line, hitting a length and cutting back in off the seam, Dilshan stumbles as he pushes it forward to the off side, another leg bye is what he gets
too wide of the stumps, Jayasuriya swings and misses
full outside off stump and punched towards extra cover for one
pitches it up outside off stump, the ball swings in and clips a faint inside edge as Dilshan flashes the bat hard at it, without much footwork, and the ball rolls toward gully
another loose ball down the leg side and Dilshan clips very fine
pitches on a length, middle and leg, and he swings it to midwicket
well bowled, but thats four, as Zaheer hits a good length to commit Jayasuriya onto the front foot, pushing at the ball and the result is a leading edge wide of slip
pitched up outside off stump, pushed toward Yuvraj at extra cover, where Yuvraj collects and has a shy and had he hit Dilshan was a goner
aha, onto the front foot and looking to thump that into the stands, but the ball pitches on a good length and subtly moves away to beat the big swish from Jayasuriya

well bowled, pitched up very full, almost in the blockhole, and Jayasuriya bunts it to midwicket and harries out of his crease, yelling at Dilshan, but gets sent back as the fielder swoop in to cut off the ball
pitches just back of a length outside off stump, Dilshan stands his ground and pushes the ball towards cover and point, just wide of the fielders stationed there
not a short ball, but Jayasuriya pulls it with enough power to work it wide of square leg and gets four, he didn't time it well at all but managed to drag it past the fielders
the thump is here! Thats the Jayasuriya special, carved over cover, just getting a bit of room to free the arms and he sends the ball flat for six, stunning hit that from the legend
again he gets some room but uses too much bottom hand, hitting the ball into the covers where the fielder stops it easily
hello dolly! Jayasuriya smashes this one off the middle of the bat, just collecting the ball off a length and swings it over midwicket for six more, this is good hitting from the veteran
slower ball, gently lobbed up outside leg stump and he picks it, swinging it down to Irfan Pathan on the bounce at deep backward square leg, so he will retain strike
banged in short and he swivels to pull it wide of midwicket for two
pitches it up to try and connect with the yorker but the ball goes adrift and Jayasuriya gets a bit of bat on the low full toss, clipping it wide and there's no fine leg
another attempted full delivery, pitches and gets a little bit of inside edge as Jayasuriya swings it across the line, the ball ricochets and dribble to backward point
again he overpitches and Dilshan drives that handsomely past mid-off
great placement ! Zaheer offers room outside off stump and Dilshan, in a flash, cracks that off the back foot and finds the gap excellently between cover and point
again short and wide but this time Dilshan crunches it to the fielder
starts off with one outside off and Jayasuriya steers it past point
pitches outside leg stump, Dilshan is cramped and pulls past square leg
pitches on a length, this one is clipped to midwicket, who collects and flings it back to the nonstriker's end, good backing up from Yuvraj, diving to his left, saves runs
just back of a length on the stumps, and rising, but Jayasuriya uses the wrists to pull the ball wide of Raina at short midwicket

good catch to get rid of Jayasuriya! Irfan pitches it up and Jayasuriya clubs it across the line and almost manages to beat mid-on, but the tall and gangly Ishant Sharma leaps up and intercepts it with one hand
pitches on a good length and Mubarak just taps it back to Irfan
tossed up, spins down and he gets a faint tickle on that one
tossed up outside off stump, Mubarak pokes it to the off side
tossed up on off stump and Dilshan drives it past mid-off
back of a length and spinning in, Mubarak punches off the back foot
tidy stuff, fuller and flatter on middle and off and defended back
slower ball, and he holds back the length a touch, so Mubarak comes forward and then drives the ball into the gap between cover and point for a single to end the over
tossed it up down leg stump and he sweeps uppishly past square leg
better line, tossed up to get Dilshan driving straight to cover
flights it outside off stump and this time he drives, bisecting the covers
fires in a low full toss on leg stump, which Mubarak punches to midwicket
fires it in again, the batsman falls forward and cannot connect
full and flat on leg stump, punched just wide of mid-on for one
tossed up outside off stump, on a length, Mubarak kneels down and heaves but cannot connect, well taken by Dhoni
comes onto the front foot and drives past cover, the sweeper attacks and doesn't collect cleanly out in the deep
tosses it up, Mubarak tries to swing it away and escapes with a thick inside edge that deviates past the stumps and Dhoni
flights it up just outside the line of off stump, turns in and beats the bat, they all appeal aggressively but umpire Gamini de Silva reckons the ball would have missed leg stump
a tad too short and he pulls it over midwicket for one
tossed up on a length and Mubarak works it to midwicket
full and flat on the stumps and Dilshan punches a single to cover
full toss on middle and leg, swept away to fine leg for one
flighted on off stump and driven off the front foot down to long-off
tosses it up just outside off stump, Mubarak swings and misses
advances to one that turns away from off stump and swings with an inside edge into the gap on the on side for another single
low full toss to end the over, and Dilshan drives it down the ground
full just outside off stump, Dilshan tries one of those en vogue paddle shots but cannot connect
just back of a length on about off stump, Dilshan likes the length and cracks it off the back foot and through the covers
hello, he's actually looking to get on with matters, is Mubarak, but he fails to connect well and instead spoons the ball over mid-off and it drops just short of the man running in
down he comes, making room, but thats a clever slower delivery, pitching back of a length, and it beats the flailing swing from Dilshan
this time he connects with the cute little paddle sweep, he gets bat on the full delivery on about middle and leg and laps it wide of short fine leg for four
understandably, Irfan holds back the length outside off stump and Dilshan goes back to punch the ball into the gap at covers
tossed up on leg, turns in, Dilshan makes room and squirts to the off
caught and bowled! Mubarak actually manages to connect one off the middle but he's clubbed it straight back to bro Yo's lap, which may not be a bad thing for Sri Lanka
tossed up on middle and off and he defends it back to Yusuf
quicker delivery, pitching just outside off stump and turning in, Kapugedera tries to turn it across the line but cannot connect, Dhoni appeals but to no avail
full and flat and bunted past the bowler to mid-on
full and flat again and Dilshan clips it to midwicket and sprints off
short and wide and cut square of the stumps on the off side
lobs it up, Kapugedera dances down and hits it over extra cover
again he uses his feet and clubs that very hard over extra cover, it reaches Irfan on the bounce but he leaps across and doesn't stop it, instead parrying it over the ropes
fire in full on leg stump and he flicks it to midwicket for one
short and wide, Dilshan flays it backward of point for a single
good shot! Jadeja invites the booming drive outside off stump and Kapugedera obliges, cracking that superbly into the gap and no one can cut that shot off
pitches short and turns in, Dilshan creates room and late cuts that down towards third man, where a diving Sehwag cuts off a boundary, well stopped Veeru
down the pitch and bang! Kapugedera lofts this one over the bowler's head and the ball just drops in front of the ropes
tossed up outside off stump, he tries to sweep it over midwicket but gets a top edge that Sehwag, running in from backward point, pouches very easily
spins in off a length and this is dabbed to point for a sharp single
short and turning down the pads, just a leg bye to square leg
short and wide, turns in but Dilshan flashes it behind point for four
spins down the pads, Silva miscues the sweep, Dhoni fumbles
uses his feet and hits it through extra cover for a couple more
skips out and collects on the full, clipping past midwicket
again good use of the feet and he punches it to the off side

flighted full on the stumps, Dilshan goes for the sweep and misses, Jadeja appeals, the arm ball hit him flush on the foot and looked, to the naked eye, to have been hitting middle stump, so thats a harsh call against the bowler .. replays also show it would have made contact, poor umpiring
comes out and misses out on a full toss, just dabs it to the off side
comes out and collects on the full, driving to midwicket for one
pitches up a slower one, full and wide, Silva swings and misses
pitches on a length, outside leg stump, Silva miscues the attempted flick and picks up a single to the off side and responds to Dilshan's call for one
the bouncer this time, no real pace to speak of, Dilshan hops up and tries to pull that one from outside off stump and wide is called owing to the height
full on off stump, clears the leg and hits it down to bro Yo at long-off
where did that come from? Out of the screws! Silva picks the slower delivery and swings it off a length, rows back over midwicket, good shot from him
full on the stumps, Silva advances and hits it back to Irfan, who collects and throws it back to the stumps, but misses
too wide, the slower ball drifts astray from the stumps to Dhoni
serves up a full toss, Silva swings it from outside off stump over mid-on
starts off with a slower ball, gently lobbed up, dips and goes down leg
full again, aiming for leg stump, he pushes it to the off side
slower ball, full on the stumps, bunted down to long-on

makes room and carves a length ball from off the stumps superbly past cover and point and that splendid shot raises his fifty, and he's the third player to get one in Twenty20 for Sri Lanka after Jayasuriya and Jayawardene
another sumptuous shot, advances and smashes it past cover
even better, and thats the 150! Ishant pitches on a length and Dilshan lofts him back over his head for half a dozen, this is a stunning assault on the bowler
and the fun is over for Dilshan, who again looks to go downtown but just gets under this one, lofting it down the ground where two fielders converge and its Raina's catch
pitches on middle and leg and this one's swung over midwicket
edged away for four! Zaheer holds back the length outside off stump and Silva shuts his eyes and swings, getting a thick outside edge over where slips could have been
change of pace, full on leg stump, clipped past midwicket for one
serves it up full just outside off stump, Weeraratne backs away and swings and just fails to connect, so thats a crucial dot ball
exposes all the sticks, Zaheer follows him with a clever full delivery, but Weeratne clubs it back past the stumps
makes room, Zaheer follows with a short bouncer, swing and miss
bangs in one and he swings it away loosely over midwicket for one
nice one, there! Fine leg is inside the circle so Weeraratne knows it, so he walks across the sticks and laps it over the fielder at short fine leg for a boundary, impressive
again he moves across but cannot connect on a full delivery
full ball on off stump, Weeraratne backs away, steering to cover
goes for a bouncer, which Silva swats at and gets an edge over Dhoni
slower ball, angling across off a length, Silva has an almighty heave but connects with nuttin' but air
slower delivery, full on the stumps, Weeraratne walks away to the fifth stump and can only get a little inside edge to the on side
again, very full, Silva kneels down and heaves it to midwicket
full in the blockhole, Weeraratne makes room, hits it back to Ishant
slower ball ends up a low dipping full toss outside off stump and Weeraratne reaches out and dabs the ball wide of backward point
another dot ball! Crafty slower ball from Ishant, full down leg stump, Silva backs away and looks to hit the ball over the field but fails to connect
full outside off stump, nearly a yorker, Silva swings and misses
